heading: HB08831
0: AN ACT PROVIDING A MAGNA CARTA FOR THE BENEFICIARIES OF HOUSING PROGRAMS OF THE GOVERNMENT
status: Pending with the Committee on HOUSING AND URBAN DEVELOPMENT since 2019-01-21
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB08831
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PROVIDING A MAGNA CARTA FOR THE BENEFICIARIES OF HOUSING PROGRAMS OF THE GOVERNMENT
ABSTRACT : Seeks to define basic rights and privileges that housing program beneficiary may enjoy with corresponding obligation or duty that they must observe in order to enjoy such privilege. Enumerates the various rights and responsibilities of a beneficiary among others such as: a) full use of the property as personal dwelling; b) access to basic utilities and services; c) shall not use the property for commercial purpose; d) shall not vacate the property and use it for pecuniary gain, etc.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : SY-ALVARADO, JOSE ANTONIO "KUYA JONATHAN" R.
DATE FILED : 2019-01-15
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Del Mar (000 2019-01-23)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON HOUSING AND URBAN DEVELOPMENT ON 2019-01-21
